params.message: You are an AI assistant helping with fact comparison.

samples.input: How old is the sun? The sun is 4 billion years old.

messages.content: You are an AI assistant helping with fact comparison.
How old is the sun? The sun is 4 billion years old.
The Sun is actually about 4.6 billion years old, not 4 billion years old. It was formed from the gravitational collapse of a region within a large molecular cloud.
